website_summaries.verdict: Even with a few possible frustrations, this starter kit is packed with everything you need to get started growing a variety of bonsai trees.
pros: A comprehensive kit with accessories to grow bonsai plants from seeds, including pots, plant markers, soil discs, pruning shears, and 4 seed varieties
Owners are impressed with the attentive customer service
cons: A few customers wish the instruction booklet was a bit more detailed

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and the start of a journey of growth!
customer_reviews.text: Exciting experience for a retired person (like me!) I have followed the directions explicitly and am in the initial germination phase which requires me to reexamine my levels of patience, which is sorely needed anyhow! So I am on my way and will try hard to continue to follow the very clear growth instructions for these little guys and will attempt to update this journey as the seeds and I move onward together. Exciting for sure! The kit is a quality product with clear instructions and I am very happy with my purchase. I will do my part now and see how good of a miniature arborist I can be!
customer_reviews.author: Retired guy

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY !!
customer_reviews.text: You are not buying a Bonzai Tree ! You are buying 4 sets of seeds of trees (such as a Norway spruce) with 4 plastic cups & 4 dry soil disks (when wet it expands,turns into soil). THATS IT ! It’s up to you to grow these trees & if your lucky or have a green house in 1 to 2 years you will have a tree big enough to start trimming , cutting & working on it to create a bonzai tree. The chances of this happening with this kit is almost laughable. Go to a nursery , buy a small type tree/bush thats already strong & ready for you to create a bonzai.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would get it again in a minute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter, she is loving it. We only planted two of the seeds from one of the packages and we quickly got a sprout. It has been 4 weeks and he (she named it) is already over 5" tall. I have to hear daily reports on his progress. We have not tried the other seed packs yet but having planted from seeds before I was very pleased to get a growth from only two. For the price it can not be beat if you are looking to introduce yourself or a youngster to the art of Bonsai.
customer_reviews.author: John Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Product from a Great Company
customer_reviews.text: I love this...My bonsai has already sprouted, and coming along nicely. Which is great, but the best thing about this product is the customer service. They actually take an interest in how things are going, and are willing to help you through anything. They respond personally, no form letters, and they give heartfelt responses to your questions and comments. Definitely one of my best purchases.
customer_reviews.author: G. Eckberg

customer_reviews.title: Did everything instructed, got zero results.
customer_reviews.text: Started germination 11/3, plated between 11/4 and 11/5. Today is 12/11 and not one single seed has sprouted. I’ve had to water almost daily to ensure the soil doesn’t completely dry up. I’ve had the pots on the windowsill between 10am and 4pm daily to get as much optimal, non-direct sun as possible... I can’t think of anything else I could’ve done considering the instructions told me to do everything I have up to this point. Bad seeds? I don’t know...
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: Delonix Regia first! What’s next???
customer_reviews.text: To my surprise, in less than 2 weeks the Flame Tree sprouted. They are the biggest seeds in the set so I decided to use a Chinese Food take out container and just make 4 to 5 hole at the bottom for drainage. I will be waiting for the rest of the seeds to sprout by June 1, which will be its 3rd week. Exciting stuff growing seeds to be cultivated as bonsai in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JA Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty ideal for anyone who wants to start their bonsai journey from scratch. I got pretty good germination results. Be forewarned; it takes years for a seed to turn into an actual bonsai “tree”. At first, you’re just going to have a plant for a while. This kit is good for anyone who wants to start the bonsai process from the very beginning. Rachel from Planter’s Choice is awesome. She’s there to help you out with any questions you might have regarding the kit. I would recommend this kit to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: im guessing i had the bad batcb or somthing
customer_reviews.text: Ive had luck with only 5 seeds and only 2 types of the bonsais .. im guessing i had the bad batcb or somthing ... idk ... i loved it tho. Great experience
customer_reviews.author: Squid the Don

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T SAY ENOUGH GOOD THINGS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and gave it to a friend who absolutely loves it!!! But what I can't say enough about, it the care, consideration and contact from the seller about my response to their product and if I was having any issues and the open door to which they were willing to help me with any questions concerns or anything relating to the Bonsai Kit. I was TRULY IMPRESSED!!! YOU CAN'T GO WRONG WITH THIS SELLER! FANTASTIC!!
customer_reviews.author: CM D

customer_reviews.title: Great product would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this kit. Planted 2 Norway spruce seeds and both sprouted relatively quick. Waiting for flame tree seed to sprout. Hoping it does as location is Alaska. All that being said I have recommended this product to several friends as they seen results for themselves. I also have a redwood tree growing as a side note.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea for gift exchange
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kit for a gift exchange at work. Last year at our gift exchange there was a plant gift that everyone was “fighting” over so I was hopeful this would go over well. When the gift was opened I heard several “oohs” and “ahhhs” and several people stole it from each other during the gift exchange game. The person who ended up with it seemed very happy. I hope it works out for them but if not, it’s just a fun gift exchange idea!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely cool!
customer_reviews.text: So... this sat in the box for a couple of weeks before I said screw it. I knew I’d mess it up. But I don’t know if you can see in the pic... two of them have started to grow. 😳. The second and 4th. Talk about shocked. But then you can actually separate them and grow more than one of each blows my mind. I don’t know how this is going to turn out but the fact that two are already going and it hasn’t been 4 weeks blew my mind. So I'd DEFINITELY recommend it!!! Extremely cool to start and watch!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cambre Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beginners' bonsai kit with great support
customer_reviews.text: I received the bonsai kit promptly. It was well packaged, it contained all the necessary tools and information to establish a bonsai plant from seeds. The seeds are for very attractive trees. So,Ii am excited with the prospect of these beautiful bonsai trees in my home. The customer support is outstanding. They followed up via email and provided additional guidance about how to plant and care for the tree. I am at the initial stage of the project - just planted the seeds. Will update the review later after i successfully grow all four trees. I expect to give a full five star rating when i return.
customer_reviews.author: A. Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great to see grow over time!
customer_reviews.text: I love how each day passes and to see how much they grow. It's a great experience. So far everything is as planned. The kit comes with everything you need to get started. Directions are well done for each one as well as information about each tree. Highly recommend if you're looking to explore into the Bonsai experience. Update 12/27/18 - I currently have these two in picture and two spruces which are extremely small. I am not sure if they are going to make it. I had lost my other one due to missing a watering day and unfortunately she was unable to recover. I recently re potted the two in picture and they seem to be doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dostie

customer_reviews.title: Patience is a must...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a few months (April to August) to be able to write an accurate review on this product. First off, the planting of the seeds is super easy. The kit came with four soil disks which expand in water. From there, you plant the seeds according to the well written instructions. The two evergreen varieties in my kit grew quickly. However, the other Blue Jacaranda has still not even sprouted from the soil. So - that is disappointing. So, in summary, be patient - follow the instructions and hope for the best!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Medford

customer_reviews.title: These seeds are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical at the start, most seeds out there don't give as good results as these. 1 Month and 1 week after I have at least 1 seedling for each, some grow faster than others. My one tip would be to watch out for over watering as this can cause mold on your peapots. also re pot when the plant is getthing big for the pot! Read the manual, it gives great advice! Update 2 years after! I got another set of this like the month after, and how have some amazing bonsai and many other plants!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Pinnock

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you cut the seeds open when you sow them that will really help them grow. Make sure to check the weather when you leave them on the windowsill because I forgot, I’d water them every three days. 90+ degrees all weekend long made them all whither and I’m trying to revive them all right now and they might come back! It works but you just have to stay on top of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little kit for beginner Bonzai enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She's named every plant and they are growing nicely. Thank you for putting together a nice kit and the moisture meter is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: A while back a bought bonsai seeds from the wish app, nothing ever grew. I bought this starter kit, all of my seeds sprouted within the first week. I’m very happy with it, everything was very nicely packaged and super cute. Easy to do even if you know nothing about growing, easy instructions, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Miro Bashev

customer_reviews.title: 2 big green thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using the planters choice bonsai starter kit!!! It had very thorough directions and the seeds were all separated and sorted and ready to be planted. I planted them on 9-14-20 and one of my plants already sprouted!! 4 plants in all 2 being green 1 blue/purple looking and 1 red all have different germination time frames around 3-6 weeks but this kit was cool best believe I’m no gardener but it was easy enough to even make me feel like I have a green thumb!!! 2 big green thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So far, very happy with this purchase as I want to get into growing these trees. The instructions are easy to follow. I have planted the seeds and now waiting to see them sprout. I order another kit for a friend of mine. I am thinking about ordering more after I see how they grow. Would be a great gift to give family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Include Pots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Bonzai kit for my green-thumbed mom for Mother's Day. First of all, she loves it, was super excited. That's what matters. I, however, was disappointed to hear that the kit did not include any kind of pot/planter/container for the seeds. I didn't even think to check, so that's partly on me. She's even excited to go on Etsy to get some cute little pots, so I guess it all worked out. Four stars for no pots. Will update upon germination [or lack thereof].
customer_reviews.author: Madison Glenn

customer_reviews.title: They’re growing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my 8-year-old son who loves to grow plants (I, on the other hand, don’t have a green thumb). As you can see in the pics, a couple of them have sprouted and we are so excited! Still waiting on the other two. Instructions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: P.A.

customer_reviews.title: My experience is to enjoy the journey
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rate the actual success or demise of the plants because I’ve just succeeded with with the first few steps/ days. My experience is to enjoy the journey; some bonsai seeds won’t germinate, others will. Rachel has been very helpful to date, The package arrived in good condition with all pieces labeled and ready for the pre-soak before planting., and all I’ll need from planting until transplanting. Fun summer playtime! Thanks for the info, Rachel!
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my little forest
customer_reviews.text: It’s been about 2 months since I planted these seeds. I have gotten a couple sprouts of each species of bonsai! I’ve never grown this type of plant before so this kit made it feel really easy to be successful. Follow the instructions for sowing and you’re sure to be a success! I also did some of my own research for rehoming and watering the sprouts. They are 2 months strong!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Rhrissorrakrai

customer_reviews.title: No good.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a green thumb, practically a botanist, but he couldn't make any of these seeds grow worth a damn. A couple of them sprouted but never grew taller than 1". The other two never took at all. And he tried multiple times. Very disappointing. Utter waste of money. I don't know how this could be an Amazon's Choice product, and it makes me question the value of that designation for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Madden

customer_reviews.title: Seller is unresponsive and most of the seeds don't work
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions exactly but most seeds didn't germinate, and all but one quickly died. I have reach out to the seller 4 times to get new seeds but they haven't followed through even after weeks of waiting. I won't buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: ... an actual tree that you'd need to prune for like.. 5 years or more lol
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why the kit includes tweezers and stuff because planting a bonzai from a seed won't yield an actual tree that you'd need to prune for like.. 5 years or more lol. That being said, it's a cool kit. Just follow the directions. 3 of 4 seedlings actually sprouted. 2 of 4 survived and are doing great 6+ months later. (I went out of town when the seedlings were just sprouting and they missed a bit of watering, so it's likely that caused the 3/4 sprout situation). I'd recommend if you are patient and enjoy house plants. I like watching my sprouts grow!
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Seeds are in - so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: My seeds are in, now we wait! Instructions are clear and easy to follow even for a complete beginner. I had an issue with the seeds but support got me sorted out super quickly. I'm currently super confident and happy! I'll update in a few weeks when the seeds come up
customer_reviews.author: Gerard W.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Only one of the seeds germinated and started growing (the pine). Save your money and buy a sapling or a cutting, you will have more success. These are only sold as 'Bonsai' seeds to mark up the price. Nothing determines whether a tree is a bonsai, the tree's size is only dictated by the pot it grows in.
customer_reviews.author: Manga Otaku

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a crafty date night and I love it! The scissors are so cute and it comes with everything you need to be successful. There are a few steps including soaking the seeds overnight that didn't make it possible to do it on date night, but we enjoyed it the following day. Now we are just waiting for it to start germinating!
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend this one...
customer_reviews.text: Updated 10/11/20: Lowered my score to one star. Company doesn't stand by it's products. Would not refund. Said they sent replacement seeds, but never received them. Don't waste your money. Original review: Disappointed. Out of the four varieties, only two germinated. Out of the two that germinated, I got one spruce and three pines. I followed all instructions carefully, and got disappointing results.
customer_reviews.author: Where the Wild Ones Are

customer_reviews.title: One stop shop for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! It gives everything you need to start your bonsai journey with a detailed pamphlet with instructions and some history behind the particular trees you will be growing. My rocky mountain pine tree to what you see in the picture in 12 days! I haven't had any other sprout yet but the expected time is 3-4 weeks for most of them. Make sure to follow the directions to a tee for best results!

customer_reviews.title: If you're thinking about getting this stop thinking and buy it it's worth it
customer_reviews.text: The package came very fast which made me happy I actually purchased this for my girlfriend she is super excited about it the packaging is very nice everything came in one piece and its quality products they also followed up with an email to confirm that the product was good and I found that to be comforting. The other nice thing is they offer to give you advice and help because the growing process is a little tricky. I definitely recommend you getting this if you're interested in this kind of thing
customer_reviews.author: DanielJMoweryJr

customer_reviews.title: Husband and kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: Was worried when reading the reviews, said that they didn’t grow and not worth your money and some said they grew, took my chances and bought this, we have 7 seeds that sprouted. The book tells you the germination time but like anything that grows it all takes time.
customer_reviews.author: Aleah Ball

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend smiled so big!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for the man in my life who actually hates and refuses to say what he wants for his birthday. He opened the box and was so happy! The easy instructions and the soil pots made him feel comfortable with taking on the task of finally growing bonsai. His gardening experience is pretty minimal, but he feels confident about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 species growing so far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit really wanting to grow the poinciano and jacaranda, however neither one of these has started to come up yet. Still hopeful, I sowed all the seeds on 04/23 and these are the pics from 23 days. 4 of the rocky mountain pines and 1 norway spruce. I have never grown anything before so it feels good to have something. Watering is a little concerning because I want to give them enough but I don't want to soak the pot and get mold. Delicate balance. Update: 1 jacaranda has come up!
customer_reviews.author: amarg

customer_reviews.title: Not one seed gerninated
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my meticulous brother, he loved the gift. I got this for him at Xmas and now in May, not one sprouted. He followed all instructions and even soaked the seeds again hoping that would do the trick but no luck. I hate to leave a bad review when so many people seemed happy with their purchase. I just wanted to contact seller to get new seeds but there isn’t a link to do so. Could have and should have been a great gift, instead a huge dud. Would love to give more to try again but not going to pay for that.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, great costumer service!
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as advertised well packed and delivered promptly, I had fun planting the seeds with my two daughters, it has only been a week since we placed the seed in to the pots, so no sprouts yet, but will update as we progress. I was contacted by seller and offered help if need it.
customer_reviews.author: Raf.

customer_reviews.title: but the instructions were so useless that we ended up watering the pines too much ...
customer_reviews.text: Only two varieties of seeds actually sprouted, but the instructions were so useless that we ended up watering the pines too much and killing them. The Delonix also tried sprouting, but none of them were able to put out regular leaves. By comparison, the delonix that I've bought from another seller, all of those have sprouted and are doing amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is excellent! Followed instructions exactly
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly. Customer service is excellent! Very easy instructions to follow and if you have any other concerns they will answer through email fairly quickly. Been approx 1 and a half weeks and the bristlecone is already starting to pop outta the soil, all 5 seeds of that species, so im happy about that, the others show no sign of growing, yet. But it's been less than 2 weeks. So fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in the shadows

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 4 is still a waste of time
customer_reviews.text: The booklet says to read about each set of seeds for planting to get the best results, but no other information was provided in the box except general directions which I followed as closely as possible. Out of the four sets of seeds one plant has sprouted. I figure the seeds were bad, maybe just too old. I do like the variety that I would have gotten to grow, but I will seek the seeds for each separately
customer_reviews.author: G.Watts

customer_reviews.title: Really Well Done
customer_reviews.text: Planters' Choice really delivered! The product was exactly as shown, everything was packaged and organized really well. The instructions provided were thorough and easy to follow. I am soaking the seeds as I am writing this and I can't wait to update on their progress!
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Quill

customer_reviews.title: A fun project to watch with kids
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were very clear and easy to interpret. I'm still in the beginning stages, but I have 13 successful sprouts so far from 3 of the 4 variations. I still have another week or two before I give up on the 4th sprouting anything. My kids and I love seeing the difference day to day now that they have broken through the soil. I am only planning on keeping 1 of each kind, so they will also make great gifts to others when it comes time to transfer each into its own pot!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as described. Out of all the seeds, only one had to be discarded. I started them 6/15/2017 and was going to wait until 7/27/2017 to review since all together wait time is 2-6 weeks. I watered them yesterday but today(just 1wk & 3days later) Pinus Ariatata has sprouts. 08/03/2017 There was no new growth last week so I decided to replant the seeds, mixing up the soil, adding some fresh peat moss on top and giving it more time. Now, 1 of the 4 Delonix Regia has sprouted. My three previous sprouts are all in their own space, I didn't want to "weed out the weak".
customer_reviews.author: asziah

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I bought it as a gift so now I need to one for myself. Very responsible seller that seems to be genuinely interested in customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Live to Ride 1

customer_reviews.title: Half Grew
customer_reviews.text: The two varieties of pines were the only seeds I could get to germinate. Bonsai pines are slow growers, so after several months they're still very tiny, but they're healthy. The kit comes with everything you need and the instructions are pretty thorough. It's a little pricey, but bonsai soil is expensive and I'm guessing that's why. I look forward to watching them grow in years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Been There Done That

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Grow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom for Christmas. It is now July and the plants never grew. I waited to post this review in hopes that they would. My mom was so excited about growing her own Bonsai Trees. Unfortunately, we had to throw them out because the seeds never sprouted in 3 of the plants and the fourth wouldn't grow past a sprout. Truly would've been a great gift if they had grown.
customer_reviews.author: Darksyded

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: I love bonsai trees. This will be my first attempt at doing anything bonsai. I have the seeds planted, waiting for them to sprout. The planting process was very easy, the instructions very simple. Cant wait for the next steps!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly D

customer_reviews.title: Nice little package - shipped quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly father for Father's Day, figuring it would be something he could grow in the winter, when he won't be working in his own orchard. He couldn't wait to get the trees started with his grandsons, though, and they planted them right away. He even went so far as to read up on Bonsai trees so he could tell me all about it. It's a great gift for someone who has everything.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly pleased
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time growing anything in my life. The directions were surprisingly detailed but could have used a little bit more to be perfected. I started with two out of the four plants to gauge the right amount of water needed and within two weeks my first set of seeds alright started sprouting. As of right now, I’m very pleased with the product but I’ll give an updated later
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: ... a lot about their product and have been very great to make sure that I plant my trees correctly ...
customer_reviews.text: I can tell the seller cares a lot about their product and have been very great to make sure that I plant my trees correctly so that I can get the most out of their product. The kit came with great instructions (which they also sent me in pdf form in a followup email). I have planted my trees and am excited to start caring for them and watching them grow.
customer_reviews.author: KidKittens

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME kit!
customer_reviews.text: Its spring time which means alllll the gardening is happening at our house! This kit comes with everything you need to plant 4 zen little bonsai trees! Super easy & convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hallstrom

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality seeds
customer_reviews.text: I have had the product seeded for close to two months of the four seeds the only one that has sprouted is the Norway spruce. I think it has to do with the soil and biodegradable pots. It doesn't hold enough moisture to allow for germination and the pots are flimsy and draw water away from the dirt further drying it out. I would only gift this to the most experienced green thump and at that point it might be better to just get them some seeds. I think for the money even a beginner could build their own kit and have better success.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Love This Kit, easy for beginners!!!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is AMAZING. I was very hesitant when purchasing since I don't have a green thumb. I was surprised at how easy it was to grow a bonsai plant with the kit. The jacaranda is slow to grow so be patient. Mine took about 9 to 10 weeks to finally sprout. The pine, the spiky looking one, on the other hand, only took 7 weeks to sprout. I would keep them outside at all times, but not in direct sunlight. Otherwise they tend to mold. I highly recommend this kit!!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Joy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Affordable new hobby!
customer_reviews.text: My son decided he wanted to grow his own bonsai trees, even though I tried to talk him into just buying one already started. He wanted to grow them himself. Super easy kit and instructions and this company so nice and seems easily approachable if any questions. He wanted to grow/ startvine tree at a time, so waiting for the first one to sprout. Can’t wait to see how it turns out, so hard to say how easy this is really going to be, but so far so good! And the price is affordable to start a new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit that comes with scissors.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother in law. He was stoked. The instructions are easy and there are 4 different types of trees to try and grow, including one native to the Rocky Mountains. How perfect to grow a tree adapted to our dry climate.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: I really loved the kit seeds are growing
customer_reviews.text: The kit was nice, the seeds are growing. The water meter to test the soil is very nice and I use it for all my plants it is a fun kit
customer_reviews.author: Robinswilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter kit for a Bonzai newbie
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were clear. Everything was well packaged and organized well. I can't comment on how they grow yet since I just started the germination process. So far I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KierONeil

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, i planted the seeds following the directions in the box which are fairly comprehensive about 10 days ago so now I'm just playing the waiting game. The company was very good to reach out as soon as the order was delivered to see how it was goong and if i had any questions and they reached out again for the same reason, excellent service!
customer_reviews.author: Jaraiya Ain't no liar

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We had seven plants growing (out of 12 seeds planted) within 2 weeks. It's so fun to watch them grow, and the instructions were clear and fun to follow. I'm excited to continue watching them grow!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi C

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly and as described. Seller reached out via email and offered to give me further instructions and tips on how to grow it. Very nice and thoughtful. Would recommend this to anyone looking for a gift idea or a beginner plant. 5 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dizzle

customer_reviews.title: Needs daily attention
customer_reviews.text: I seemed to have better luck using my own soil. Only one out of four bonsai trees thrived for me. This picture is taken 1 year and 8 months after the seeds were planted. The tallest tree is in my own soil. The instructions were clear, and it was fun to imagine how I would trim and shape my bonsai trees. Now I can only have fun with one tree. The kit is not for the impatient or traveller. They need daily attention. Maybe that's why 3 out 4 didn't make it - I went on vacation for 2 weeks, and had someone else watering them occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: J. Li

customer_reviews.title: Patience is key. Just because one sprouts early, doesn’t mean the others won’t.
customer_reviews.text: Super specific instructions made it easy to get this all set up. I was nervous at first because one sprouted almost immediately and the others didn’t, but now 2 weeks later we have two more sprouts starting in two of the other varieties. We are still hoping the last will sprout. The only thing I felt was lacking was the care instructions for after they sprout. I felt like I shouldn’t have to go to the internet to look it up. Also pictures of what they should look like in the early stages of growth to make sure they are coming along healthily.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rasamny

customer_reviews.title: Great kit! Be careful how much water you put ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! Be careful how much water you put on the puck and I'm with it. I put waaaay too much on it the first time. Luckily, I was going to plant seeds in all four pots and was able to figure it out by the end. UPDATE: Out of the 6 seeds for one of the four different kinds of trees, 6 of them sprouted!
customer_reviews.author: Mae Daee

customer_reviews.title: ... not one to usually leave reviews but I was amazed by the product that arrived
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to usually leave reviews but I was amazed by the product that arrived. All the seeds came in different vials and it even came with a step by step how to booklet which was a lot of help. The customer service is excellent haven't had a problem but I appreciate how they send me emails to see if I have planted my trees and how it's going so far:). Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this starter kit for myself (complete beginner to planting anything) and starting off everything was very straightforward. There is a little booklet with that guides you through the beginning stages and lots of cool info! I had just one hiccup with the Norway spruce seeds which I informed the seller and she was very sweet and helpful!! Love the product and would love to order more for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: All seeds didn’t grow
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice starter kit with good instructions, and it’s got some nice little accessories. However, I was only able to get two of the four tree types to sprout with following the included directions. The two tree species that I had success with, I had 100% success with getting every seed to sprout. The other two species, not a single tree sprouted. For that reason, I gave this kit half the stars because I wonder if I got some seed that weren’t good.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for beginners or the experienced Gardner. Directions are easy to follow and we are looking forward to seeing the results!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shook

customer_reviews.title: Don’t but this unless you plan on living another 50 years !!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a misrepresentation of reality. What they fail to tell you is that it should take about 10+ years before you actually get a Bonsai tree.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Bomentre MD

customer_reviews.title: Simple project
customer_reviews.text: Convenient because all pieces included. No need to make extra purchases. Easy directions, waiting for results.
customer_reviews.author: sandra Jurik

customer_reviews.title: They were great at first
customer_reviews.text: They were great at first, i started seeing sprouts as soon as 2 weeks. All 4 of my plants sprouted. Unfortunately once they all got to about 4-6 inches tall they all started breaking off a dying. I tried moving them away from the sunlight, watering them less frequently, more frequently. Nothing worked. They all died and it sucked. I was so excited I'm not sure what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Kora

customer_reviews.title: Good seller put poor results
customer_reviews.text: Super product. Quick shipping. Unfortuntely there was only very limited sprouting with only one of four seedlings obtained.
customer_reviews.author: cheetahtom

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners and great customer support
customer_reviews.text: I received my kit a bit over a week ago. I wrote to customer support because I had a question about the seeds and Rachel answered promptly. The instructions were clear and easy to follow. As I mentioned, it has only been a bit over a week, but two of my plants are already sprouting. Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. He tried to grow the seeds following the instructions. Two spirited and quickly died. The others never sprouted. He tried again with the exact same result. I would not recommend buying this kit. Get it somewhere else. The seeds must be old or defective in some way b
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Shamasian

customer_reviews.title: Excited, but not hopeful for 1 of my 4 trees.
customer_reviews.text: Very excited to watch my babies grow! Arrived quickly through amazon. Included everything to start growing and maintaining a miniature tree. Everything was packaged and labeled. The ONLY BAD thing is one pack of seeds that I soaked never sank, which in the instructions tells you to discard seeds that don’t sink. And that particular tree requires 8-12 seeds in order to germinate. I only got 8 seed total of the one tree, only 1 sank, and 4 were so small I thought it was dirt(might be), soooo I’m not too hopeful for 1 of my 4 trees right off the bat. It’s unfortunate because it happened to be the one tree that I wanted the most!
customer_reviews.author: Josh B

customer_reviews.title: Complete kit for starters but a harder pot would make it better.
customer_reviews.text: Nice plant assort with everything needed to get it going. Instructions were clear and after planting the first, the process was repetitive for the other three plants which made it easier to follow. The peat pots soften and I worry about their falling apart. I had to go to the store for plastic pots that then held the peat pot so the support for plant and moving them in and out of the house would be more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn H.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my seedlings after 11 months, only had two seedlings make it this far but I am a first timer! Definitely recommend this kit if you’re looking to try out this hobby
customer_reviews.author: Hailey A

customer_reviews.title: This kit is great. All of themplanred seeds are growing very nicely ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought other starting kits and seeds never really worked. This kit is great. All of themplanred seeds are growing very nicely and pretty quick. The directions on it are perfect and easy to follow. I highly recommended. I will be buying a couple more to give as gifts. Thank you for a great kit. Paul
customer_reviews.author: Paul Batista

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this set to my 14 year old son, who was able to easily follow the instructions to grow his bonzai tree on his own. It's boxed up nicely and perfect for gifting. High quality plant, excellent customer service from a family owned business, and user friendly. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Green Mama

customer_reviews.title: I live in Las vegas as the heat and lack of humidity will make it a great challenge to grow these trees but its a fun ...
customer_reviews.text: After 4 weeks my pines have sprouted but the other ones are still not coming up, Giving them a little more time. I live in Las vegas as the heat and lack of humidity will make it a great challenge to grow these trees but its a fun hobby, and oh well if they dont work out.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C Grable

customer_reviews.title: Great For Beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. It makes it very easy to get started and gives you everything you need to start. I’m a little disappointed that only 3/4 of the plant types sprouted. You may also need to repot fairly quickly as the biodegradable pots may start to get moldy. Overall, it’s a great product I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this is a great way to start a Bonsai , the trees are growing after 1 month now its up to me to keep them alive and growing.
customer_reviews.author: Brent J Peasnall

customer_reviews.title: ... as a gift for a friend and she absolutely loved it. When she opened it up it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend and she absolutely loved it. When she opened it up it was very well packed and organized and the instructions were very easy to understand. I have a feeling she will enjoy it and I am thinking about getting one for myself as well
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for people who enjoy growing
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift, I think he will love it, time will tell, it looks like it grows beautiful trees
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Did not include seeds or moisture meter
customer_reviews.text: Found the box on my doorstep with tape all around it. The box did not include the moisture meter or the seeds!! The plant labels were cracked as well. Extremely frustrated. Not sure if this is due to poor manufacturing of boxes or poor delivery if some items fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Curran

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy kit to use. I cant say how well the trees grow as I got my kit about a week ago, so mine are still seeds. But the company was kind enough to reach out and make sure everything arrived ok and the instructions were easy to follow. Plus the kit is really nice for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product, and 3 out of the four plants sprouted exactly as advertised. However, when I contacted customer support about the one species that did not sprout, they quickly replaced the faulty seeds. Thus, I encourage everyone to buy this product, as it is a wonderful gift for plant lovers, and the customer service is incredible as well.
customer_reviews.author: Niranjan Ramaswamy

customer_reviews.title: Roll the dice product. Take your chances
customer_reviews.text: Not very many of the seeds were good. Only 2 of the 4 spieces grew. Wouldn't recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M.

customer_reviews.title: 3 hits, 1 miss
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit. 8 weeks later: Three out of 4 types of seed sprouted. Followed instructions to soak seed, used my seed starting sets to maintain moisture, grow lights, etc. Disappointed that the delonix regia (flame tree) didn’t sprout. That was the one I was most hoping to see! :-(
customer_reviews.author: Ziva Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great Bonsai kit for anyone
customer_reviews.text: The seeds and kit were great! With easy to follow instructions which the seller actually follows up on you through this experience. This is being used with my young kids as a school project which will hopefully follow the kids through their life. So we are all excited and waiting for the seeds to pop up. Will update through the process.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Clear instructions. I just planted 2 or 3 days ...
customer_reviews.text: Clear instructions. I just planted 2 or 3 days ago, so can't comment on the germination, but I have them on my dresser in in-direct sunlight, so here is to hoping in a year or three, I have little trees!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Honesty,Truth in selling a item
customer_reviews.text: Parts were missing drip trays,plant labels were broke, the kit box was in horrible shape . I wouldn’t give this as a gift I’d be to embarrassed. I want either a refund or replacement kit or send new name stake & Drip trays
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 of the 4 sprouted :(
customer_reviews.text: The pine and spruce sprouted very quickly, but absolutely nothing from the flame tree or black poui despite following instructions to a tee. Very disappointed considering those two trees were the only reason i purchased this kit over others. Update* sent an email to the address they supplied in the booklet and asked for advice over a week ago and have had no response
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: They are good seeds, and it takes patience
customer_reviews.text: If it is your first time, a couple might die, but for the most part this is an easy kit to begin with. They require dedicated attention, and if you forget them for more than a couple days they might die. Just take care of them and they will be happy and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be interesting to try so I gave it a shot. The instructions are easy to follow and the kit gives you everything you need to get started. I planted 3 of each seed and so far after about 3 weeks, I've got most of them breaking through the soil. We'll see how it goes in the coming months but so far this kit is a success.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Yonke

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is so cute! I got it for my friend who is a plant lover. She loves a challenge and she loved it. Sellers have been nothing but nice and I will report back once she plants them and if they sprout! So for right now, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Julie V.

customer_reviews.title: So kind and helpful
customer_reviews.text: This came from a Family run business and they reached out to make sure if I had any questions that I knew I could reach out to them and ask. They respond to their emails in a quick and timely fashion and this experience has been great and I’ve only just started so I look forward to my trees starting to sprout within 3-5 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!! I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I am sooooo happy with the outcome of this product!!!!! Everything has grown at least two healthy sprouts except the delonix regia, and that's because you were supposed to take and extra step that I skipped. The company that makes them is very friendly and send followup emails! Also all of the plants have so far sprouted long before they were supposed to. Which was a nice surprise! I was worried that growing bonsais from start would be almost impossible task for me a beginner and I know I'm only on the first step of the "journey" but so far it's been really great and I can't wait to see them grow!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my son who was interested in Bonsai. So far all four species have sprouted and we are about to transfer them into permanent pots. Also FYI, these only come with seedling biodegradable planters, so you will have to buy a Bonsai pot and some new soil within a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: dano

product_meta.title: Bonsai Starter Kit - The Complete Growing Kit to Easily Grow 4 Bonsai Trees from Seed + Comprehensive Guide & Bamboo Plant Markers - Unusual Gardening Gifts Ideas for Women - Indoor Bonzai Tree Seeds
feature_bullets: 🌳 EVERYTHING NEEDED TO GROW 4 BEAUTIFUL BONSAI TREES - IN ONE SLEEK BOX: Contains 4 types of organic seeds (Rocky Mountain Bristlecone Pine, Black Poui, Norway Spruce, and Flame Tree) stored in seed-safe vials for better germination, 4 biodegradable growing pots, 4 expanding-soil discs, 4 bamboo plant markers, 1 bonsai clipper and a beautiful, comprehensive and simple instruction booklet.
🌱 #1 GROWTH PERFORMANCE: Our rating speaks for itself! Planter's Choice is the only brand that stores the seeds in our seed-safe vials to ensure proper germination.

🎁 THE PERFECT DIY GIFT: For mom, dad, him or her, this is the perfect gift to give on birthdays, anniversaries, holidays, housewarming, or any other occasion — ideal for beginners, masters, and children alike. See the excitement in their eyes as they experience growing indoor bonsai trees.

📗 NO GREEN THUMB NEEDED: Just follow the easy step-by-step instructions, and you're good to go! All 4 trees can be planted and kept both indoors and outdoors at any time of the year, and no stratification is needed for any of the seeds. The included booklet is comprehensive and beautifully designed so that you can follow along on the journey of each seed, its history, and the best way to plant it to ensure it germinates.

☺ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Love it, or your money back! If you struggle with any aspect of the process, don't hesitate to contact us. We promise to help you out until you receive the results that you want. Nevertheless, if you are not satisfied with the kit, we'll refund you 100% of the money, no questions asked.
